## My first own Leaflet map


---
title: "Neli's map"
author: "This is where I work"
always_allow_html: yes
---


```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(leaflet)



my_map <- leaflet()%>%
  addTiles()%>%
  addMarkers(lat=52.50309, lng=13.4499, 
             popup="Neli Dilkova's Office") 
             
my_map
```
